tool_description:
AmiiboAPI is primarily used for educational purposes.

An Amiibo database that holds all amiibo information in a single API.

All Respective Names are Trademark & © of Nintendo 1996-2018
name: AmiiboAPI
title: AmiiboAPI

api_list.name: Amiibo Data - Game Series
api_list.description: Get all the amiibo based on it's game series as a list.
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://n3evin-amiiboapi-v1.p.rapidapi.com/amiibo/?gameseries=Chibi Robo"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "n3evin-amiiboapi-v1.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
api_list.convert_code:
import requests

url = "https://n3evin-amiiboapi-v1.p.rapidapi.com/amiibo/?gameseries={gameseries}"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "n3evin-amiiboapi-v1.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())

api_list.name: Amiibo Data - ID
api_list.description: Return the amiibo information base on it's id.

required_parameters.name: id
required_parameters.description: the full if of the amiibo. [either id, head or tail]

optional_parameters.name: head
optional_parameters.description: The head value of the id. [either id, head or tail]

optional_parameters.name: tail
optional_parameters.description: tail value of the id. [either id, head or tail]

api_list.name: Game Series
api_list.description: Retrieve game series information. Warning: Not all data return a list, do read about it.
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://n3evin-amiiboapi-v1.p.rapidapi.com/gameseries/"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "n3evin-amiiboapi-v1.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
